titleStmt.title: An electronic transcription of Cairo Genizah Fragment TS E2.74 (Cambridge)
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

availability.licence: This work is copyright Hayim Lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a .

note.p: Fragment in the Cambridge University Libraries, Taylor-Schechter Collection. Covers Sanhedrin 5:2 - 7.1.
Transcription from online images of the manuscript, available at https://fgp.genizah.org. FGP nos. C211273 - C211274. Recto and verso are registered in reverse order
Dimensions: 30 x 25 cm. Approximately 2.6 characters per cm.

div3.note: At the end of chapter 6, formula matches the common form for a chapter end, but the chapter number corresponds to the following chapter.
This is the common form for a chapter end, but the chapter number corresponds to the following chapter.
